mutants.code:
def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ''.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::-1]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ','.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::+1]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ','.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::-2]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ','.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::-0]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ','.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::-0]
    return reversed_string

def reverse_array(arr):
    arr_string = ','.join((str(x) for x in arr))
    reversed_string = arr_string[::--1]
    return reversed_string
